name: 20151: Supar Derp Ball 3000
description:
Controls are W,S and UP,DOWN for the sliders, the rest is controlled by your mouse ;)

This is Supar Derp Ball 3000!! (title by the awesome Lionade Games)

It's my very first game a week of 2015, it was build for mobile phones and perhaps tablets. I don't recommend playing the browser version, so I've put up a download link for the apk!

music by Kevin McLeod ~ funkorama

I hope you all have as much fun as I did in making it, if you want to check out more of my work, visit my website! http://www.basweijenberg.nl
